name: Revelation Dance
description: You strike out at a target with an aggressive dance.Â  Make a melee attack, dealing 2d8 + MOVE damage on a hit. Revelation Dance deals damage with a different type depending on the style of Oricorio:
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
